article.title: NCI to Provide Integrated Soldier Systems to Kuwait, Afghanistan
article.author: George Seffers
article.text: NCI Information Systems Incorporated, Reston, Virginia, was awarded a $34,074,541 cost-plus-fixed-fee for the services in support of fully-integrated soldier systems. Work will be performed in Middle River, Maryland; Fort Belvoir, Virginia; Fairfax, Virginia; Fort Benning, Georgia; Sierra Vista, California; Vint Hill Farms, Virginia; Kuwait; and Afghanistan. The U.S. Army Contracting Command, Aberdeen Proving Ground, Maryland, is the contracting activity.
